title: When you play Zilean and you know your bomb is about to kill your enemy.
body:
Just walk away from the blast like a boss.
https://38.media.tumblr.com/32f171988f9a47bcbb11dcfc6b5c190b/tumblr_mqpl8xGHiW1rk8pivo1_400.gif

replies.body:
woah
since when was Power Rangers so violent?
I remember watching it as a kid and I do NOT remember that...

> [{quoted}](name=Coriandr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QuxXGdBb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-23T17:46:46.724+0000)
>
> woah
> since when was Power Rangers so violent?
> I remember watching it as a kid and I do NOT remember that...

They always had over the top explosions that were not warranted at all. Things just exploded out of nowhere.

> [{quoted}](name=Gunpoint,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QuxXGdBb,comment-id=00000003,timestamp=2015-10-23T22:44:05.330+0000)
>
> They always had over the top explosions that were not warranted at all. Things just exploded out of nowhere.

*Gets hit with sword*

**EXPLOSIONS**
So power rangers inspired Michael bay, amirite

Like sparks fly whenever they cut someone.

Every.  Damn.  Time.
The original power rangers also had semi-real looking combat. Now its all fake explosions every two seconds.
it was that bad even in the first series, the difference being that A) they couldnt do those kinds of explosions cheaply back then B) there were just as many but they were instead sparks and smoke.

Really?
Hmm, guess its been longer than I thought... I remember it being pretty clean besides fist fights and sometimes an exploding building or one on fire or something, but never a person. :I

Yeeeeep. They've always done this. The explosions weren't all that amazing, but before they used to combine their weapons and super explode the poor bastards. They still do that now I believe.... Power Rangers hasn't changed a bit despite what everyone wants to say.

> [{quoted}](name=Coriandr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QuxXGdBb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-23T17:46:46.724+0000)
>
> woah
> since when was Power Rangers so violent?
> I remember watching it as a kid and I do NOT remember that...

That's like ever  bad guy  dieing ever they go out in exploding fashion
yea they blew that dude to pieces, like damn
{{champion:18}}
That actor had it bad. Damn.
Inb4 {{item:3156}}
[Cool Guys Don't Look At Explosions.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sqz5dbs5zmo)
You mean "badasses" correct?
{{champion:238}}
And then you remember the person you put a bomb on was Fizz.
That's actually a pretty damn crazy stun for the dude surrounded by explosions. Holy shit.
Remembers  me of one of my last Zil games. stole my vayne like, 7 consecutive kills because they always got away with 20-30 hp. she wasnt even mad ( a wonder happened)
